resources.string: You need to allow iSpeed to access your location
Notification access is required, Please enable it on the settings to receive notifications.

1. Click “Begin Test” to start tracking your internet
2. After clicking “Begin Test” wait for the application to assess your internet connection
3. The metrics “Download, Upload, Ping” must display the measured data
4. A receipt will pop up containing the results after the assessment is done.
5. Click “Save” to save the receipt on your gallery.
6. Click “Cancel” to close the receipt

1. The graph shows the stability of your internet connection.\n 2. To view the complete synchronize logs of internet stability, select from “Days, Weeks”\n 3. The dashboard below shows the continuous tracking of your internet stability.

1. Click the “Target Location” button on the mid right part of the screen to pin your current location.\n 2. Click “Measure” to begin measuring the state of your internet connectivity on your current location.\n 3. After the assessment, there would be message bubble appearing below indicating that the testing results was imported to your device’s gallery.
